title: The Lindsay Kemp Circus
creator_credit: Contemporary Films, Douglas Eadie and Oscar Marzaroli
brief_description: Presents Lindsay Kemp, the most accomplished mime artist to emerge from Britain, his extraordinary co-star Orlando and their troupe. The film reflects the “lush decadence” of their work - Kemp performing the ultimate tatty striptease and Orlando singing “I Must Have A Man”.
creator_credit_for_label: Contemporary Films, Douglas Eadie and Oscar Marzaroli
